Delivery Portal CLI
===========================================

Installation 
----------------

How to install it. 

``code_api.dp_cli`` currently because in "wrong" directory. Need to adjust docs to be in cli directory. 

Usage
-----

.. click:: dp_api.code_api.dp_cli:cli
    :prog: code_api.dp_cli
    :show-nested:
